name: MAJOR
description: Major is a Play to Earn game in Telegram with a unique idea and implementation, created to increase the popularity of the TON platform and blockchain. The $MAJOR token will be used in game mechanics, and also serve as a means of payment in the exchange of NFT numbers and Telegram usernames. The utility of the token is that it will be used in the game as a payment method. Additionally, in Major, one can promote projects using the $MAJOR token. There will also be a platform for renting NFT numbers and usernames in Telegram!
